page.title: 12A DODGING GAME.
page.content: {QUICK JACK There are two safe places (dens) opposite each other.One person is chosen to stand between the two dens.The other players run backwards and forwards from one den to the other.The person in the middle of the two dens has to try and touch any player who runs near to him.When he succeeds in touching someone,that person joins him in trying to touch the other players.This goes on until all the players are standing in the middle between the two dens.Then the game starts again,with the person who was touched first standing in the middle of the two dens.
